comments:
Description:
Render the report document use genReport error[00]

Render the report document by genReport, and it will pop up the error message.



Failed to load Derby embedded driver: org.apache.derby.jdbc.EmbeddedDriver
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org/apache/derby/jdbc/EmbeddedDriver
	at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method)
	at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:242)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.sampledb.SampleDBJDBCConnectionFactory.getDerbyDriver(SampleDBJDBCConnectionFactory.java:123)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.sampledb.SampleDBJDBCConnectionFactory.shutdownDerby(SampleDBJDBCConnectionFactory.java:83)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.sampledb.SampledbPlugin.shutdownDerby(SampledbPlugin.java:183)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.sampledb.SampledbPlugin.cleanUp(SampledbPlugin.java:95)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.sampledb.SampledbPlugin.stop(SampledbPlugin.java:85)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleContextImpl$3.run(BundleContextImpl.java:1040)
	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleContextImpl.stop(BundleContextImpl.java:1036)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleHost.stopWorker(BundleHost.java:457)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.AbstractBundle.suspend(AbstractBundle.java:527)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.Framework.suspendBundle(Framework.java:1091)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.StartLevelManager.decFWSL(StartLevelManager.java:673)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.StartLevelManager.doSetStartLevel(StartLevelManager.java:289)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.StartLevelManager.shutdown(StartLevelManager.java:259)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.SystemBundle.suspend(SystemBundle.java:188)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.Framework.shutdown(Framework.java:666)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.Framework.close(Framework.java:569)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.OSGi.close(OSGi.java:41)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.adaptor.EclipseStarter.shutdown(EclipseStarter.java:398)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:585)
	at org.eclipse.birt.core.framework.osgi.OSGILauncher.shutdown(OSGILauncher.java:375)
	at org.eclipse.birt.core.framework.Platform.shutdown(Platform.java:100)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.execute(ReportRunner.java:172)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.main(ReportRunner.java:117)

When a report document is render the variable derbyClassLoader in the class SampleDBJDBCConnectionFactory will not been initialized. So  when the method shutdownDerby() is called a ClassNotFoundException  will be thrown. Fix this bug.
